comments: Professor Ippolito is AMAZING! I\'ve taken him 4 time already because he is so clear and understand that we have a lot going on other then school. Don\'t get me wrong, we work but its very manageable. I will take him as many times as necessary

comments: best proffesor i\'ve had in monroe. ippolito is super fair gives the homework upfront so you can get a head start, gives a lot of input in his personal experience in the field. shows you what APA is suppose to be. only thing is he shows a lot of videos but they are very interesting.

tag_professor: Respected (2)  Gives good feedback (2)  Skip class? You won\'t pass. (1)  ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS (1)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (1)  Amazing lectures (1)
comments: Ippolito is a great Professor. In his lessons he incorporates life experiences of his field work and humor to try to lighten the subject of Victimology. He is fair and very straight to the point when it comes to the work & in lessons and though comical you do receive your monies worth.
